name: Ghostrick Kitsune
text:
2 monsters, including a "Ghostrick" monster.
You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Ghostrick" monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Ghostrick Kitsune" once per turn. While you control a "Ghostrick" field spell, this card gains the following effects:
● Your opponent cannot target "Ghostrick" Link Monsters for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.
● You can activate the effects of "Ghostrick" Xyz monsters you control as quick effects.
